segments.text: I observe the woman in her apron, dutifully drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen light filters through the window nicely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, water is cascading over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's forming a slippery pool on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's oblivious, one foot submerged without a care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her side, stacks of clean dishes wait patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turning my gaze left, I spot the open cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is teetering on a stool, hand deep inside it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's legs are buckling; this isn't safe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister stands below, eagerly anticipating her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're conspiring in whispers, full of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden view outside seems worlds away from this frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching the potential accident unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why hasn't anyone turned off that faucet yet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic bliss is hiding real hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR
